Header: The Rajarata University closed down indefinitely due to a viral fever
Content: The Rajarata University has been closed down indefinitely due to a viral fever. The viral fever was spreading among the students of the Rajarata University for few days. The university authorities said that a second year student of the Applied Science Faculty Oshani Pitawala passed away due to the disease. Registrar of the university Y. Karani said that they closed down the university due to the spread of the viral fever.
